.
Terminating Awards Based on DMF Matches
A Veteran’s death must be processed via the FIRST NOTICE OF DEATH command in Share.  Award adjustments necessitated by the death of any other payee should use EP 130 for award action.
Note
:  Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.D.3
if
action on the DMF match cannot be taken immediately, and
the action involves an award of disability compensation.
References
:  For more information on
EP credit, see
M21-4, Appendix B
, and
non-Veteran beneficiary notice of death processing guidelines, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, 1.D.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 2, Section B - Social Security Death Master File (DMF) Match
